Claim: "A young man in an orange shirt rides a skateboard."
Referring expressions: Young man, orange shirt, skateboard  A person, skateboard
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsYoung(b) and IsInOrangeShirt(c) and IsRidesSkateboard(a)))) & (forall f (forall e ( IsRidesSkateboard(e) ->  IsYoung(f))))) -> (exists a (IsRidesSkateboard(a)))
